supportingDocuments.powerOfAttorneyModal: Een ondertekend en gedateerd document dat een persoon machtigt om de wettelijke vertegenwoordiger van een bedrijf te vertegenwoordigen of namens hem op te treden.
supportingDocuments.purpose.Administrato: Besluit tot benoeming van de beheerder
Document providing the decision to appoint an individual as the administrator of your organization.
supportingDocuments.purpose.AssociationR: Officieel document dat de registratie van uw vereniging aantoont. (< 3 maanden oud)
supportingDocuments.purpose.CompanyRegis: Uittreksel van het handelsregister (KVK document, minder dan 3 maanden oud)
Een officieel uittreksel van het handelsregister dat niet ouder is dan 3 maanden. Je kunt via de website van KVK een recent uittreksel downloaden.
supportingDocuments.purpose.FinancialSta: A copy of the document submitted to your tax bureau at the end of the last business period.
supportingDocuments.purpose.GeneralAssem: Notulen van de laatste algemene vergadering van de vereniging
supportingDocuments.purpose.LegalReprese: Bewijs van identiteit van de wettelijke vertegenwoordiger

Document proving your legal representative’s identity.
Authorized documents:
- Passport
- ID card (citizens of countries in the European Economic Area only)
- Resident permit (residents of countries in the European Economic Area only)
- Driver’s license (residents of countries in the European Economic Area only)
supportingDocuments.purpose.NIFAccredita: Copy of your NIF accreditation card to provide your tax identification number.
supportingDocuments.purpose.Other.descri: Upload any supporting document you feel will help in the onboarding process.
supportingDocuments.purpose.PowerOfAttor: Volmacht getekend door de wettelijk vertegenwoordiger
supportingDocuments.purpose.PresidentDec: Besluit tot benoeming van de beheerder
Document providing the decision to appoint an individual as the president of your organization.
supportingDocuments.purpose.ProofOfCompa:
Official document that includes the company’s address.
Authorized documents:
- Recent water, electricity, or gas bill
- Official tax certificate or tax exemption certificate
- Proof of insurance document
- Property ownership document or a rental agreement
Official document proving the organization's income
supportingDocuments.purpose.ProofOfIdent: Geautoriseerde documenten: Paspoort, ID-kaart (alleen van toepassing op burgers van lidstaat van de EER-zone), Verblijfsvergunning (alleen van toepassing op inwoners van lidstaat van de EER-zone)
supportingDocuments.purpose.ProofOfIndiv:
Official document issued in your name that includes your current residential address.
Authorized documents:
- Recent water, electricity, or gas bill
- Official tax certificate or tax exemption certificate
- Lease agreement or rental receipt

Document verifying your income and your ability to pay.
Authorized documents:
- Pay stub, pay slip, or salary slip (fewer than 3 months old)
- Income tax return (fewer than 2 year old)
supportingDocuments.purpose.ProofOfOrigi:
Official document proving the origin of funds
Authorized documents:
- Pay stub, pay slip, or salary slip (fewer than 3 months old)
- Income tax return (fewer than 2 year old)
supportingDocuments.purpose.SignedStatus: De regels die uw bedrijf heeft opgesteld om leden te reguleren en de beleefdheid te handhaven.
supportingDocuments.purpose.SwornStateme: Eedaflegging ter bevestiging van de UBO-verklaring
Om regelgevende redenen vereist Swan een eedaflegging om de geldigheid van uw UBO-verklaring te bevestigen. U kunt een sjabloon gebruiken of uw eigen verklaring opstellen.
supportingDocuments.purpose.UltimateBene: Bewijs van adres van de uiteindelijk belanghebbende eigenaar

One document for each beneficial owner, proving their identity. (Beneficial owners hold 25% or more of your company’s shares, or any person who controls your company's executive bodies or management.)
Authorized documents:
- Official tax certificate or tax exemption certificate
- Proof of health insurance document
- Property ownership document, lease agreement, or rental receipt
Bewijs van identiteit van de uiteindelijk belanghebbende eigenaar

One document for each beneficial owner, proving their identity. (Beneficial owners hold 25% or more of your company’s shares, or any person who controls your company's executive bodies or management.)
Authorized documents:
- Passport
- ID card (citizens of countries in the European Economic Area only)
- Resident permit (residents of countries in the European Economic Area only)
- Driver’s license (residents of countries in the European Economic Area only)
taxIdentificationNumber.label: Btw-nummer
